statements: SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_location, warehouse_capacity FROM WarehouseLayout ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_capacity > 1000;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_location FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_capacity < 5000 ORDER BY warehouse_capacity ASC;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_capacity, layout_geometry FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_location > 50.0;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_capacity, inventory_list FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE ST_DWithin(layout_geometry, 'POINT(0 0)', 1000);
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_capacity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_location DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_capacity FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_location < 50.123456;
SELECT warehouse_id, ST_AsText(layout_geometry) FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE ST_Distance(layout_geometry, 'POINT(12.345678 45.678901)') < 1000;
SELECT warehouse_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(inventory_list) AS total_items FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(inventory_list) > 0 ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_number = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity, aisle_number FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE rack_number IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM inventory_placement WHERE position_lat < 40;
SELECT aisle_number, rack_number, shelf_number FROM inventory_placement WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_number = 1 ORDER BY rack_number DESC, shelf_number ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity > 100 AND product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_placement WHERE position_lat > 40.0 AND position_long < -70.0 ORDER BY position_lat ASC;
SELECT aisle_number, rack_number, shelf_number, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM inventory_placement GROUP BY aisle_number, rack_number, shelf_number;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, warehouse_id FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT product_name, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM material_handling WHERE handling_capacity > 100;
SELECT handler_name, department FROM material_handling ORDER BY handler_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouse_layout WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, 'Point(-122.3321 47.6062)') <= 10;
SELECT handler_name, department FROM material_handling WHERE department = 'Logistics' ORDER BY handler_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout INNER JOIN inventory ON warehouse_layout.location = inventory.location;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, total_capacity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE total_capacity > 10000;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM material_handling WHERE handling_cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE total_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC;
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, total_capacity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_name LIKE 'W%' AND total_capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, quantity, location_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT movement_id, inventory_id, from_location_id, to_location_id, movement_date FROM inventory_movement WHERE movement_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM material_handling_devices WHERE device_type = 'Forklift' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM material_handling_devices JOIN warehouse_layout ON material_handling_devices.location_id = warehouse_layout.id;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_id, last_checked, status FROM inventory_status WHERE status = 'ok';
SELECT device_name, device_type, location_id FROM material_handling_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_status WHERE last_checked > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
